synopsis.text: Itâ€™s crunch time for unrequited love in the final days of school! As Karasuma prepares for a life-changing move to America, Tenma finds herself in a race against time to confess her true feelings before he boards the plane. Amidst the chaos of a school walkathon on the beach, Tenma's heartfelt confession leaves her upset and searching for solace in lemonade with her friends. Meanwhile, Kenji struggles with his own emotions for Tenma, and in a twist of fate, he becomes her unlikely companion on a motorbike ride to the airport. Will this whirlwind of events finally lead to a resolution of the trio's complicated feelings? Join Tenma, Kenji, and Karasuma in these two heartwarming episodes that promise laughter, love, and a dash of seriousness, culminating in a happy ending you won't want to miss!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
